itSolution.title: IT Solutions
itSolution.desc: At Orient Star Group, technology is.atthe heart of our logistics operations.Our integrated digital platformempowers you with real-timevisibility, automation, and control-delivering smarter, faster, and morereliable supply chain execution.

coreSystem.title: Core System Capabilities
coreSystem.desc: Our portal brings together all key logistics functions in one place

item1.title: Client Portal
item1.desc: Centralized access to all services and data

item2.title: POMS
item2.desc: Purchase Order Management: Track PO status, manage releases, and monitor fulfillment progress.

item3.title: IMS/MS
item3.desc: Inventory & Warehouse Management: Monitor warehouse trends and stock levels across locations.

item4.title: TMS
item4.desc: Transportation Management: Schedule shipments, view booking details, and track milestones across air and ocean.

item5.title: Quotation & Billing
item5.desc: Request quotes, access billing summaries, and download invoices with ease.

integration.title: Integration & Connectivity
integration.desc: Our portal brings together all key logistics functions in one place.

item1.title: API & EDI Integration
item1.desc: Real-time data exchange with your ERP, WMS, or marketplace platforms.

item2.title: Custom Data Mapping & Automation
item2.desc: Tailored integration workflows to match your business processes.
